1561830.name: Island of the Lost Soundtrack
1561830.description: The original soundtrack to Island of the Lost is here! Composed by Emmy nominated composer Nicholas Singer. Immerse yourself in the stunning musical atmosphere of a vast, uninhabited island. Over 80 minutes of music in 34 tracks, the Island of the Lost soundtrack is a journey into a tranquil, relaxing environment, one that you will enjoy revisiting again and again.
